meta.description: Buy airport lounge access. Learn how to access Narita International Airport (NRT) lounges with a day pass, airline status, membership, or credit card.

location.terminalDirections: International Departures, 3rd Floor, next to Gate 26.

lounges.name: All Nippon Airways ANA Arrival Lounge

location.terminalDirections: Arrivals Hall, in the South Wing, 1st Floor
From the 4th Floor (Departures Level), take central escalators up to the 5th Floor, the lounge is located on the right hand side.

From the Arrivals Hall, proceed up the escalators to the entrance on Level 2

Level 2, after Immigration and Passport Control, near Gate 71.
From 3rd Floor (Departures Level), take escalator next to 'G' check-in counter to 4th Floor, turn left and proceed straight for 10 meters to the entrance.
